FuncDef: This command configures the source individual attachment identifier (SAII) for an MPLS-TP spoke SDP. If this is configured on a spoke SDP for which vc-switching is also configured (for example, it is at an S-PE), then the values must match those of the taii-type2 of the mate spoke SDP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the global ID at the source PE or T-PE for the MPLS-TP PW for a spoke SDP. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Specifies the node ID at the source PE or T-PE for the MPLS-TP PW for a spoke SDP. Values-a.b.c.d or 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the attachment circuit ID at the source PE or T-PE for the MPLS-TP PW for a spoke SDP. If this node is the source of the PW, then the AC ID must be set to a locally unique value. Values-1 to 4294967295.
